#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
long long n;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		long count=1,res=0, a[n];
		for(long i=0;i<n;i++)
		 cin>>a[i];
		 sort(a,a+n);
		 for(long i=0;i<n;i++)
		 {
		 	if(a[i]==a[i+1])
		 	 {
		 	 	 count++;
				if(count>=res)
		 	 	 {
		 	 	 	res=count;
		 	 	 }
		 	 }
		 	 else
		 	   count=1;
		 }
		 if(count==1&&res==0)
		   cout<<res+1<<"\n";
	     else
	      cout<<res<<"\n";
	}
	
	return 0;
}
